heading: Bass trombone music.
general-note: Here are entered compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for solo bass trombone, and collections of compositions in several forms or types for solo bass trombone..

The term "bass trombone" is used as a medium of performance in headings for works for one or two solo instruments. In headings for other works that include bass trombone, the generic term "trombone" is used as the medium of performance..
